Name: The Four Rabbits
Description: Wilex, Luna, Keru and Aster are a set of four rabbit siblings who once lived in a village in the Forsaken Mountains.
Lore Box: Wilex, Luna, Keru and Aster are a set of four rabbit siblings who once lived in a village in the Forsaken Mountains. When they were teenagers, they were exiled by a large monster, and they went their separate ways all around the world. Their paths would cross again several years later.
